components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Acts as a load balancer and provides application-level routing and security.

components.name: Web App
components.description: Hosts the main application interface, deployed in a zone-redundant App Service Environment.

components.name: Private API
components.description: Serves backend functionalities, load-balanced for reliability.

components.name: Azure Cosmos DB
components.description: A globally distributed database service for handling large-scale data.

components.name: Firewall
components.description: Protects the internal network from unauthorized access and manages outbound traffic.

data_flows.description: External traffic is routed through the Application Gateway for load balancing and security.
Routes requests to the Web App for user interface interactions.
Web App calls the Private API for backend functionalities.
Private API retrieves and stores data in Azure Cosmos DB.
Firewall manages and secures traffic to all internal components.

trust_boundaries.name: External to Internal Network
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between external internet traffic and the internal Azure resources.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Access Layer
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between application logic and data storage.
